How To Play HOW TO PLAY GETTING STARTED Running Dead is a fitness application that forces you to exercise to survive the virtual zombie attack!

To start playing, tap play and register an account. NEXT
LEARNING TO PLAY Login to Running Dead

To Play, Enable the GPS function on your phone and tap Play.

You are now viewing the Map, tap the Centre Location button in the top right hand corner and the screen will now centre to your current location.

In this game you will need to accumulate points for the distances you cover.
PLAYING THE GAME Zombies will now spawn around your Immediate Location, The objective of the game is to avoid these zombies while trying to reach the Finish Line.

In this game you will need to accumulate points for the distances you cover, Try to get as far as you can!
